version.description1: Config version number used for auto_regen_outdated.

auto_regen_outdated.description: Should this file automatically regenerate whenever the default options are changed?

reveal_from_detecting_mobs.description: Should Assimilated Sculk Activators reveal nearby assimilated sculk if they detect a mob?

tentacle_view_range.description1: How far should you be able to see Assimilated Sculk Tentacles from?
tentacle_view_range.description2: Reducing this should help with performance

alien_assimilated_sculk_placement.description1: 1 in this number chance every 3 seconds for the Alien Thing to attempt to place an Assimilated Sculk Tentacle while in the 1951 form.
alien_assimilated_sculk_placement.description2: Values less than 1 disable this feature.
